section.title: What is the Domain Management Tool?
section.para: The Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager authenticates users using directory services. Adding and removing users from the system requires the admin user to add the directory service relevant to the user.

The directory services supported by Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization are Active Directory and IPA. The Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager includes a domain management tool, rhevm-manage-domains, to add and remove domains provided by these services.

The rhevm-manage-domains command is only accessible on the client machine on which the Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager is installed. The rhevm-manage-domains command must be run as the root user.
